thread.title: Nasdaq closes at record high as Google surges; Dow dips

title: Nasdaq closes at record high as Google surges; Dow dips
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Jul 17, 2015, 21:25 BST - UK Markets closed Nasdaq closes at record high as Google surges; Dow dips AFP – 11 minutes ago View Photo 

The Nasdaq closed at a record high for the second straight session Friday, jumping more than 0.9 percent following a surge in Google (Xetra: A0B7FY - news ) shares. 
At the closing bell, the tech-rich Nasdaq Composite Index stood at 5,210.14, up 46.96 points (0.91 percent). The Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped 34.24 (0.19 percent) to 18,086.01, while the broad-based S&P 500 added 2.23 (0.10 percent) at 2,126.52.
